reactor.tcp.config

Class ServerSocketOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.tcp.config.CommonSocketOptions<ServerSocketOptions>
      • reactor.tcp.config.ServerSocketOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NettyServerSocketOptions

    public class ServerSocketOptions
extends CommonSocketOptions<ServerSocketOptions>
    Encapsulates configuration options for server sockets.

      int backlog()
      Returns the configured pending connection backlog for the socket.

      Configures the size of the pending connection backlog for the socket.

      Returns a boolean indicating whether or not SO_REUSEADDR is enabled
      ServerSocketOptions reuseAddr(boolean reuseAddr)
      Enables or disables SO_REUSEADDR.
